LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableDoor.label: 固化门
LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableDoor.description: 配有特殊装置的门，通电时自动上锁。
LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableWall.label: 坚垒
LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableWall.description: 一堵通电后的墙，表面的高压电能防止任何伤害。
LanguageData.VibraniumWall.label: 振金墙
LanguageData.VibraniumWall.description: 用振金制成的墙。能吸收90%以上由子弹和爆炸造成的伤害。
LanguageData.CorrosiumWall.label: wall
LanguageData.CorrosiumWall.description: Wall of Corrosium. Increases Your Maximum Health Over Time.
